body: - New docs released on docusaurus
- Fix profile parsing error for zwift
- Fix the email validation Libre issue, to accommodate the increase in users.
* Bugfix - when reading Oura body data, the date of all returned readings was set to today rather than the actual date.
* Bugfix - when storing Oura activity, body and sleep data, we were storing multiple activities for the same day. Now we store only one entry per day, the most recent one.
- Use correct Webhook topic name based on region

- Bugfix - gender is now case insensitive 
- Bugfix - preventive fix on how data without an explicit id is identified across our system. This makes updating existing data work, rather than creating a new record
- [Improvement] - Improve logic around api key handling.

- Bugfix - We are now returning the proper HR Zones for Garmin. These values come in seconds, previously it was in minutes. This is not a breaking change, since no users were relying on these values (we weren't returning any, previously). Notice that not all providers are capable of producing the HR Zones.
- [Improvement] - list of providers (GET `/providers/`) now returns the provider's description.
- [Bugfix] Make PubSub push endpoints more robust to changing message attributes
* Add the blood_pressure.read scope to Google Fit.
- Under the hood improvements across multiple systems.
* Fixed a bug with Fitbit when reconnecting a user.
* Vital US now defaults to FreeStyle Libre us
* Fixed a couple of issues around the Fitbit integration.
- Bugfix: when fetching sleep data with start_date and end_date set to the same day, the returned data was not including sleep streams.

- [Improvement] Calories were added to Google Fit data.
- [Improvement] Cancel an order added to Orders V3.
- [Bug fix] Merge Body for Manual and Apple Health is now behaving as expected.

* [Bugfix] Fitbit webhook updates were not working properly for /body and /sleep resources.
* [Improvement] We now allow the same Google Fit account to connect to multiple Vital users.
* [Improvement] Improvements Freestyle libre multi-region support.
* Various stability improvements under the hood.
* [Improvement] Performance improvements to Fitbit

- Various stability improvements under the hood.
- [Improvement] Added `reject` status for Orders.
- [Improvement] Backfill historical data for Withings data bumped from 30 days to 120.

Various stability improvements under the hood.
[Bug fix] Further bug fixes on GoogleFit integration.
[Bug fix] Prune null workouts for Withings. 
[Bug fix] Tentative fix for Wahoo integration.
- [Bug fix] Fixing Wahoo workouts
Enable multi-region support for freestyle
* Google fit: improved the way we fetch steps and calories data for activities and other reliability improvements
* Fixed a bug when reconnecting a google fit user after an error occurs.
- Various fixed under the hood.
* Various fixed under the hood for Strava and Withings integrations.
* Add body measurements to Google Fit.

- [Bug fix] Strava, Peloton and Fitbit now have a title on the Workout response.
- [Bug fix] Withings daily workouts are now working.
- [Bug fix] For whoop, an "activity" was being treated as gymnastics. It will now be treated as "other".
- [Bug fix] If the user doesn't give permission to weight and height for Oura, the system should cope with it.
- [Improvement] Added "order_lost" to Order status.
* Upgrade to Freestyle LU Version 3.7.58
* BUGFIX - update Libre data format
- [Improvement] Expose sleep score for Garmin, Oura and Whoop
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.
* Improved HTTPX Error logging
* [Bugfix] Fix external client error handler
Automate sentry release versioning

* Expose Withins sleep score through Vital API
* Add Support for parsing TCX files from Fitbit
- Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.
- Implement workouts and heart rate for Oura v2

- Migrate Strava to provider connection
- Add heart rate as a supported resource for Oura
- Add hashed email as provided_id for Oura
- Implement provider connection for Wahoo
- Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.

- [Improvement] - Allow redirecting using auth-email and auth-password from the widget
- [Improvement] - Fix Whoop logic around heart rate data to prevent missing heartrate averages and maximum
- [Improvement] - Expose created on connected sources
- [Improvement] - Improve V3 testing api

## What's Changed
* [VIT-1279] Fitbit heart rate situation by @gabrieleangeletti in https://github.com/tryVital/vital-mono/pull/886
* [VIT-1282] Add daily and historical /heart subscriptions to pub/sub by @gabrieleangeletti in https://github.com/tryVital/vital-mono/pull/888
* fix: remove Oura parse heart rate by @Graviis in https://github.com/tryVital/vital-mono/pull/889


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tryVital/vital-mono/compare/0.1.121...0.1.122
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.

* Add support for sleeping HR data for Fitbit
* IHealth bug fixes for heat rate data fetching
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.

* Beta version of Dexcom integration.
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.
* Fixed a bug when returning HR data in Fitbit sleep.
* Added HR data when returning Fitbit sleep with stream.
* Bug fixes to Google Fit and Withings sleep resource.
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.

- [Improvement] We will now send a new webhook named `daily.data.workout_stream.created`. This change is for providers that only have their workout stream data ready after the actual workout. Only Garmin is suffering from this problem. Thanks Ethan for reporting.
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.
* Add support for Fitbit HRV data during sleep (beta).

* Whoop: calculate movement based on workouts that are walking, or running. We calculate steps based on the distance of those activities.
* Eightsleep: (1) Use the score from EightSleep as sleep score (2) Efficiency is calculated by `(total_sleep / total_time_in_bed) * 100` (3) HRV, RHR and Average HR if inexistent should be None, not 0.
* The GET /v2/testkit endpoint now returns the list of biomarkers associated with each testkit.

- [Improvement] - Ensure average HRV is calculated from Fitbit correctly.
- [Improvement] - Speed up requests for summary data.

* Fix Oura provider. There is a bug on their side for which after fetching an access token, the token is not usable for some time. We are handling this now, but hopefully Oura will fix it on their side soon.
* Fitbit historical fetch of HR data was 7 days - it's now bumped to 14.
* Bugfix - Daily HR webhook updates were not including user_id and source_id.
* Preparation for support of AU and DE Freestyle Libre regions.
* Under-the-hood bugfixes and improvements.

* Daily webhooks for vitals now return the full source object instead of source_id.
* Improvements to the lab testing API.
* Google Fit - expose the following fields in Workouts: `timezone_offset`, `average_watts`, `max_watts`, `average_speed`, `max_speed`.

* Support HR for Fitbit workouts
* Support HR statistics for Oura workouts
* Bug-fix for provider-specific optional data

- [Improvement] Users are now sorted by creation date in the dashboard.
- [Bug fix] Fixed a bug where most recent data for WIthings wasn't fetched.
- [Bug fix] Fixed a bug where Withings data wasn't stored correctly.
- [Bug fix] Fixed a bug where HR data from Oura wasn't stored correctly.
- [Bug fix] Fixed multiple bugs related to how Strava HR data is stored.
- [Improvement] Added lower and upper bound for a result's marker expected values.
* [Bug fix] Fixed a bug with fetching HR data for Fitbit workouts.
* Under-the-hood bug fixes and improvements.
- [Bug fix] Several bugs fix on the Garmin and Strava integration.
* [Bug fix] Duplicated text messages being sent after a Testkit order has been rejected.

## What's Changed
- [Improvement] You can now directly push heartrate timseries data.
- [Bug Fix] Fixed the team's endpoint.
- [Bug Fix] Fixed an issue on how we calculate the heartrate timseries timestamp data.

## What's Changed
* [Bug Fix] Add subscription status to the update team schema
- [Bug Fix] Fixed a bug in the HR endpoint.
- [Bug fixes] ...
- [Improvement] - Improve texting for testkits.
[Feature] Teams can add their logo to the vital link widget

- [Bug fix] We are now able to calculate Garmin HR Zones properly.
- [Bug fix] Workout's stream webhook was sending sliced information. This is now fixed.
- [IMPROVEMENT] - Improve test kit status updates
